          <title>
            <string language="en">Biological clock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologische Uhr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horloge biologique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pulso de disparo biológico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orologio biologico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιολογικό ρολόι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reloj biológico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie chart shows the amount of time young babies are awake and asleep during the day.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">asleep</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">awake</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Night</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">young babies</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kreisdiagramm stellt dar, daß die 
Zeitmenge junge Babys wach und während des Tages schlafen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme circulaire circulaire montre que la 
quantité de jeunes bébés de temps sont éveillée et en sommeil 
pendant le jour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de torta mostra que a quantidade de 
bebês novos do tempo está acordada e adormecida durante o dia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a torta mostra che il tempo i 
bambini giovani è sveglio ed addormentato durante il giorno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα πιτών εμφανίζει χρονικό διάστημα 
που τα νέα μωρά είναι άγρυπνα και κοιμισμένα κατά τη διάρκεια 
της ημέρας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de empanada muestra que la cantidad de
bebés jóvenes del tiempo está despierta y dormida durante el día.</string>
          </description>
